description: This file defines a Slack-based reasoning agent for financial data analysis, including agent configuration, tools, and server setup.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: SlackAPI
classes.description: Handles Slack app integration and server setup.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude language model used by the agent.

classes.name: ThinkingTools
classes.description: Provides tools for reasoning and analysis.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides tools for financial data retrieval.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the Slack app server with specified parameters.
